acceptance_criteria: Project field exists on Tick struct, JSON serialization works, tests pass
closed_reason: Added Project string field to Tick struct in internal/tick/tick.go with json:"project,omitempty" tag. Added comprehensive JSON marshal/unmarshal tests covering: marshaling with project, omitting empty project, unmarshaling with project, and defaulting to empty string when project is missing.
description:
Add Project string field to internal/tick/tick.go Tick struct.

- Add: Project string `json:"project,omitempty"`
- Field is optional (empty string = no project)
- No validation required
- Add test for JSON marshaling/unmarshaling with project field
